name: xstruct
description: Implementation of straightforward extraction of structured data from web pages.

scripts.test: rm -rf js && coffee -co js . && cp -p $(find modules/ -name '*.js') js/modules && cp -R tests/data js/tests && istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive js/tests -R spec -r should && cp README.md package.json js/

author: Constantin Titarenko
